concept_data.title: European Training Foundation
concept_data.category_name: EU institutions and European civil service
concept_data.category_full: 1006 EU institutions and European civil service

summary: The European Training Foundation (ETF) is an agency established to support the development of vocational education and training systems in EU partner countries. It operates under the principles laid down by the European Parliament and is governed by provisions that ensure its activities conform to applicable EU regulations. The ETF's budget is allocated to training initiatives that enhance public access to education and skills development. Documents regarding its operations include proposals for joint projects and declarations of intent. The foundation plays a crucial role in implementing training policies, thereby contributing to the broader goals of the EU and EEC, as amended in June.
